Bash(git -C /home/doug/Dropbox/Projects/CRM_Extender/CRMExtender commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix company merge FK constraint error when absorbed company was a prior merge survivor

The company_merges.surviving_company_id FK \(NO ACTION\) blocked DELETE when
the absorbed company had been the surviving side of earlier merges. Now
re-points those audit records to the new survivor before delete. Also
transfers user_companies visibility rows so users don''t lose access.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
